scripts.postinstall: mkdir node-wot; cd node-wot; git init; git remote add -f origin https://github.com/eclipse/thingweb.node-wot;git config core.sparseCheckout true; git pull origin pull/934/head; npm install; cd ./packages; cd ./td-tools; npm install; npm run build; cd ..; cd ./core; npm install; npm run build; cd ..; cd ./binding-http; npm install; npm run build; cd ..; cd ..; cd ..; npm install ./node-wot/packages/td-tools; npm install ./node-wot/packages/core; npm i ./node-wot/packages/binding-http
